It would no longer target children.
Perhaps the most prominent thing that you and I might recognize is that we no longer see Joe Camel and the Marlboro Man on billboards or on taxicabs.
No more outdoor advertising.
Now the companies are having to be much more targeted in the way that they reach smokers.
They have these elaborate databases.
They use direct mail.

Smoking rates are certainly down.
For kids, they've dropped from 36 to 20 percent over these last 10 years.
